member.name: T:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources.ActionText_AlterObject
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Script ALTER.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Script CREATE.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Script DELETE.

member.name: P:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources.ActionText_InsertObject
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Script INSERT.

member.name: P:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources.ActionText_LocateInObjectExplorer
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Locate in Object Explorer.

member.name: P:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources.ActionText_SelectObject
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Script DELETE.

member.name: P:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Resources.ActionText_UpdateObject

member.name: T:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Connect
member.summary: The object for implementing an Add-in.

member.name: M:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Connect.#ctor
member.summary: Implements the constructor for the Add-in object. Place your initialization code within this method.

member.name: M:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Connect.OnConnection(System.Object,Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode,System.Object,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnConnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being loaded.
member.param: Root object of the host application.
Describes how the Add-in is being loaded.

member.name: M:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Connect.OnDisconnection(Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnDisconnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being unloaded.
member.param: Describes how the Add-in is being unloaded.
Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Connect.OnAddInsUpdate(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnAddInsUpdate method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification when the collection of Add-ins has changed.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Connect.OnStartupComplete(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnStartupComplete method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application has completed loading.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:ToyBox.SsmsAddIn.Connect.OnBeginShutdown(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnBeginShutdown method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application is being unloaded.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.
